subject: Marathon Running
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Just as in the Olympics, there was Sammy Wanjiru of Kenya, who won his first London Marathon in a blistering 2 hours 5 minutes 10 seconds.
snippet: Just as in the Olympics, there was Sammy Wanjiru of Kenya, who won his first London Marathon in a blistering 2 hours 5 minutes 10 seconds.
